work.summary: Internship at Scania, where I work with a team focused on digitalization and data-driven approaches, utilizing computer vision and AI to enhance production
Gained hands-on experience with machinery and learned about hardware and software used in automotive products
Assisted with customer service, merchandising and operation of the cash register. Enhanced my communication skills and learned effective store management.
My first job involved working at a café in Herrljunga kommun during the summer and on weekends.
